snippet: Backing Vladimir V. Putin into a corner will not work, President François Hollande of France said, reflecting sanctions fatigue among European officials.
abstract: French Pres Francois Hollande, in interview, objects to idea of further sanctions imposed by Western nations on Russia due to crisis in Ukraine; comments add to growing number of Europeans expressing concern about effects of sanctions on Russian stability.
lead_paragraph: Backing Vladimir V. Putin into a corner will not work, President François Hollande of France said, reflecting sanctions fatigue among European officials.

headline.main: French Leader Urges End to Sanctions Against Russia Over Ukraine
headline.print_headline: French Leader Urges End to Sanctions Over Ukraine
